settings.heading: Zebra
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts offers a wide variety of ruggedized mounting solutions for Zebra mobile computers, printers, barcode scanners and more. Utilizing our form-fitting cradle design, securing your device wherever you need it has never been easier. The versatility of RAM® systems allow you to efficiently move your device between your car, desk, forklift, and much more. Allowing for near-infinite adjustability as well as vibration damping, the RAM®double ball and socket system provides maximum versatility and helps to extend the life of these devices. Explore the full line of Zebra device mounts below.

settings.heading: TC73 & TC78 Form-Fit Docks
settings.copy: The next generation of handheld PC is supported by the industry leading rugged mounting provider, RAM® Mounts. With the combination of powered and non-powered. locking and non-locking form-fitting cradles with RAM® Compatibility, end users have the flexibility to create the mounting solution that best suits their needs in the field. Shop the TC73/TC78 docks now.

settings.heading: ET40 & ET45 Enterprise Tablet Docks
settings.copy: The full range of RAM® Mounts and GDS® Tech™ line of products are coming soon for the all new Zebra ET40 and ET45 enterprise tablets. From charging docks to protective IntelliSkin® sleeves, RAM® is your one stop shop for enterprise ready mounting solutions.

settings.heading: ET80/ET85 2-In-1 Tablet Docks
settings.copy: Whether you're a First Responder, manufacturing line worker, or Field Service technician, your customer’s work is fundamental to their community. Keep the Zebra ET80 and ET85 2-in-1 Tablets ruggedized with RAM® docking stations. These docks support the device with or without the Rugged Frame, with or without the Friction Hinge Rugged Keyboard, AND accommodates tablet add-ons.

settings.heading: TC53 & TC58 Powered Docks
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts is proud to announce a new line of form-fit powered docking stations to charge and secure the TC53 & TC58 in virtually any environment; all while keeping features and functionality of the device fully accessible while docked.

settings.heading: Handheld PC Solutions
settings.copy: Featuring combination and key locking variations, these rugged powered cradles are designed to get the job done in the field while keeping your device charged and secure from theft. Each form-fit Cradle is RAM® Mounts Compatible™ and can be expanded with any B or C size diamond base, double ball mount, and any base for your desired mounting location. Available for select Zebra Handheld Computers, including the Zebra TC51, 52, 56, 57 and TC70, 72, 75 & 77.

settings.heading: Printer Solutions
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts first started its long-time partner with Zebra developing mobile printer mounts. Our printer mounts use a unique patented spring loaded mechanism that provides a strong hold, yet provides easy removal for printer storage. At each end of the cradles are side clamping plates that are designed to fit cleanly around the edges of a printer. Ideal for the field service and material handling spaces.

settings.heading: Rugged Tablet & PC Solutions
settings.copy: To conquer everyday tasks in the warehouse, in the field, or on the front lines, RAM®Mounts rugged mounting solutions enable Zebra's versatile tablets to make the ideal pairing. Explore the RAM® Tab-Tite™ and RAM® Tab-Lock™ product lines to find a multitude of universal and locking options.

settings.heading: Scanner Solutions
settings.copy: Keep scanner guns in an ergonomic and user-friendly location with these rugged holders. The open bottom design of the RAM® Power-Grip™ enables scanning while in the holder, and replaceable elastomeric fins grip the handle of the scanner for a secure hold. Another holder, the RAM® Drop-N-Lock™, is designed to hold most types of pistol grip mobile computers with scanning capabilities. The spring-loaded lever on the side of the holder secures devices – simply drop the handle into the holder and it locks in place. And last but not least, the rugged RAM® Quick-Draw™ also features spring-loaded functionality to secure scanner guns and handheld computers that fit within the compatible dimensions.
